CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Treatment Completed stage positioned above or below the Initial Consultation stage?
SRP.A: The Treatment Completed stage is positioned {below} the Initial Consultation stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Treatment Completed?
VE.A: The value of stage Treatment Completed is {601}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Treatment Initiated?
VE.A: The value of stage Treatment Initiated is {739}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Initial Consultation, with a value of {2059}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Post-Treatment Assessment, with a value of {523}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Diagnostic Testing to stage Diagnosis Confirmed?
SC.A: Decreased by {409} Patients from stage Diagnostic Testing to stage Diagnosis Confirmed.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Treatment Recommended to stage Treatment Initiated?
SC.A: Decreased by {265} Patients from stage Treatment Recommended to stage Treatment Initiated.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 1135? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Initial Consultation} stage has {2059}, the {Diagnostic Testing} stage has {1676}, the {Diagnosis Confirmed} stage has {1267}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 562? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 670 and 1135? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Treatment Recommended} stage has {1004}, the {Treatment Initiated} stage has {739}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Diagnostic Testing to Diagnosis Confirmed, or from stage Treatment Recommended to Treatment Initiated?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Diagnostic Testing} to {Diagnosis Confirmed} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Treatment Completed to Post-Treatment Assessment, or from stage Treatment Initiated to Treatment Completed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Treatment Initiated} to {Treatment Completed} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Diagnostic Testing to Diagnosis Confirmed, from stage Treatment Initiated to Treatment Completed, or from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to Treatment Recommended?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Diagnostic Testing} to stage {Diagnosis Confirmed} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Diagnostic Testing} and {Diagnosis Confirmed} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Treatment Completed} and {Post-Treatment Assessment} stages.
